FUID-AUTON:05919-23937-00_29a92f36.longDescription: CitrusFarm is a multimodal agricultural robotics dataset that provides both multispectral images and navigational sensor data for localization, mapping and crop monitoring tasks. 1) It was collected by a wheeled mobile robot in the Agricultural Experimental Station at the University of California Riverside in the summer of 2023. 2) It offers a total of nine sensing modalities, including stereo RGB, depth, monochrome, near-infrared and thermal images, as well as wheel odometry, LiDAR, IMU and GPS-RTK data. 3) It comprises seven sequences collected from three citrus tree fields, featuring various tree species at different growth stages, distinctive planting patterns, as well as varying daylight conditions. 4) It spans a total operation time of 1.7 hours, covers a total distance of 7.5 km, and constitutes 1.3 TB of data.
FUID-AUTON:05919-23937-00_29a92f36.shortDescription: CitrusFarm is a multimodal agricultural robotics dataset that provides both multispectral images and navigational sensor data for localization, mapping and crop monitoring tasks. 1) It was collected by a wheeled mobile robot in the Agricultural Experimental Station at the University of California Riverside in the summer of 2023. 2) It offers a total of nine sensing modalities, including stereo RGB, depth, monochrome, near-infrared and thermal images, as well as wheel odometry, LiDAR, IMU and GPS-RTK data. 3) It comprises seven sequences collected from three citrus tree fields, featuring various tree species at different growth stages, distinctive planting patterns, as well as varying daylight conditions. 4) It spans a total operation time of 1.7 hours, covers a total distance of 7.5 km, and constitutes 1.3 TB of data.

FUID-BITNA:00344-2960-00_46dde3c7.longDescription:
Bitnami, the leaders in application packaging, and Automattic, the experts behind WordPress, have teamed up to offer this official WordPress image on Google Cloud Marketplace.

WordPress Multisite enables you to make one WordPress deployment to manage multiple, independent websites. These websites can all have unique domain names and layouts while sharing assets like themes and plugins. It is ideal for universities, corporations, and agencies that need to enable many people to manage their own websites.

For content authors, the Jetpack plugin (enabled by default) offers access to additional professional themes, performance improvements, scanning, site activity, and marketing tools. Other popular plugins like Akismet, All in One SEO Pack, WP Mail and Google Analytics for WordPress also come pre-installed. Optional automatic backup and priority support are available from Automattic.

For developers, this image features the AMP for WordPress plugin. This plugin automatically adds Accelerated Mobile Pages (Google AMP Project) support to deliver a faster, higher-performance and more flexible web experience across distribution platforms. It helps you reduce the costs of your site by pairing your content to the format required by the destination platform and making the user experience consistent across devices.

This image includes the latest version of WordPress, PHP, Apache, and MySQL. It is secure by default, as all ports except HTTP and HTTPS ports are closed. HTTP/2 and Let's Encrypt auto-configuration are supported.

Why use Bitnami Certified Apps?

Bitnami certified images are always up-to-date, secure, and built to work right out of the box. Bitnami packages applications following industry standards and continuously monitors all components and libraries for vulnerabilities and application updates. When any security threat or update is identified, Bitnami automatically repackages the applications and pushes the latest versions to the cloud marketplaces.

FUID-DIGIT:02028-13955-00_c81ed7f8.longDescription: Background: The MAP assessment solution is designed to help customers successfully migrate to the cloud using AWS services. It includes a comprehensive assessment of the customer's existing IT infrastructure, including an evaluation of their application dependencies. Based on this assessment, our team works with the customer to develop a tailored cloud migration strategy that minimizes disruption and maximizes cost savings. Cloud Migration Process: •Planning and assessment: We evaluate clients' readiness for migration and identify the necessary capabilities and use cases and provide a business case, TCO, and ROI analysis to help clients make informed decisions. • Designing migration architecture: We design a cloud-enabled operating model and technical foundation, incorporating security and compliance at every level. • Migration and validation: We conduct thorough mapping and testing of data at each stage of migration, as well as post-migration validation. Features: • Infrastructure evaluation: Assessing the current IT infrastructure to determine if it is compatible with the cloud platform. • Application dependency analysis: Identifying dependencies of the current applications to determine how they will function in the cloud environment. • Migration strategy development: Creating a migration strategy tailored to the organization's unique needs, including identifying key steps and milestones. • Security evaluation: Reviewing current security measures to ensure compliance with cloud security standards and identifying areas for improvement. • Cost optimization analysis: Identifying opportunities to save costs by reviewing the current infrastructure and suggesting cloud-based solutions. Benefits: • Cost savings: Reduces infrastructure and maintenance costs, and identifies opportunities for cost optimization. • Flexibility and scalability: Provide a highly flexible and scalable infrastructure, enabling quick adaptation to changing business needs and demands. • Improved security: Offers robust security features and can identify security gaps and recommend best practices. • Increased agility: Enables faster deployment and prototyping, allowing for quick testing and new product/service launches. • Better performance and reliability: Offer high-performance infrastructure and redundancy, enhancing application and service reliability. Deliverables: • Perform a cloud readiness assessment to identify gaps and optimization opportunities in the current infrastructure, along with a thorough on-premises inventory assessment of the customer's IT environment. • Calculate total cost of ownership (TCO) to comprehend the cost-saving potential of AWS migration, recommend cost optimization and evaluate environmental impact. • Recommend right-sizing migration and modernization efforts by evaluating applications to determine which should be migrated, modernized, replaced, or retired. • Develop an implementation plan that outlines the necessary resources, timelines, and key business events for migrating applications to the AWS cloud. • Create an enablement plan for a seamless transition to operations post-migration, providing support and guidance throughout the process and ensuring the customer's full readiness to operate in the AWS cloud. • Draft a target AWS environment with low, medium, and high-level architecture diagrams to depict the customer's new AWS environment and its integration with their existing IT infrastructure. • Create documentation outlining IAM strategy, security, compliance requirements, and migration method to ensure the customer's comprehensive understanding of the migration process and compliance with industry regulations and standards.
FUID-DIGIT:02028-13955-00_c81ed7f8.shortDescription: Digital Alpha Platform provides a comprehensive Migration Acceleration Program (MAP) assessment service to evaluate customers' readiness for AWS application migration. This assessment serves as a precursor to potential subsequent migration phases, allowing clients to approach the process with clarity and confidence. By simplifying the complex cloud migration process, businesses can focus on building capabilities that drives growth.

FUID-DIGIT:05842-23842-00_402b02c5.company: digital earth africa part of the amazon sustainability data initiative
FUID-DIGIT:05842-23842-00_402b02c5.longDescription: The Global Mangrove Watch (GMW) dataset is a result of the collaboration between Aberystwyth University (U.K.), solo Earth Observation (soloEO; Japan), Wetlands International the World Conservation Monitoring Centre (UNEP-WCMC) and the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA). The primary objective of producing this dataset is to provide countries lacking a national mangrove monitoring system with first cut mangrove extent and change maps, to help safeguard against further mangrove forest loss and degradation. The Global Mangrove Watch dataset (version 2) consists of a global baseline map of mangroves for 2010 and changes from this baseline for six epochs i.e. 1996, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2015 and 2016. Annual maps are planned from 2018 and onwards. The dataset can be used to identify mangrove ecosystems and monitor changes in mangrove extent. This is important in applications such as quantifying ‘blue carbon’, mitigating risks from natural disasters, and prioritising restoration activities. For more information on the Global Watch Mangrove product see the Global Mangrove Watch website.
FUID-DIGIT:05842-23842-00_402b02c5.product: digital earth africa global mangrove watch

FUID-DODGE:05364-21498-00_d4f78810.longDescription: Real Estate Analyzer (REA) is a database of commercial properties (Multi family, Hotel, Warehouse, Office, Retail, Dormitories and Senior Housing) in various stages of construction in the U.S. and Canada. It is a product aimed at the commercial real estate community. REA offers valuable insight into the opportunity or risk that supply changes may represent for investment portfolios of commercial real estate companies. REA goes back to 2000 and is updated monthly. • Multi Family • Office • Warehouse/Industrial • Hotel • Retail • Senior Housing • Dormitory Data Validation & Cleansing/Value Added Reporting REA raw data go through validation checks and data cleansing processes. They are reviewed, researched and updated by Analytic Specialist to assure the data accuracy. Additional value-added data gathered by Analytical Specialists includes, among other things, completion dates, square footage, subclasses, opening date for hotels and units for nontraditional residential buildings like hotels and senior housing. Hotel and Retail Brands Brand names are given for retail and hotel properties when available. For example, REA subscribers have an ability retrieve only Hilton Hotels, rather than all hotels, or CVS, rather than all retail properties. We currently track 307 hotel brands and 1073 retail brands. Two Unique Stages REA reports and tracks construction projects through nine different phases: pre-planning, planning, final planning, bidding, start, underway, completed, deferred, and abandoned. We estimate the target completion dates for the project that broke ground by using the methodology we developed internally if the target completion is not filled by Dodge Reporters. Later, we verify the completion date two months before to the target date for the projects valued at 20 million and over (Value criteria is $10 million and over for hotels). In addition, we verify the target start date for the projects valued $20 million and over. Geo-coding All US projects in REA are given latitude and longitude co-ordinates and the degree to which a project has been geocoded. Geo-coding data helps our subscribers to identify projects in a specific real estate submarket. Subclasses: Each property class is made up of more narrowly defined subclasses in REA. This gives commercial real estate companies an easy way to assess the coming supply by breaking out high-rise office buildings from all office buildings, apartment or townhouse/condo projects from total multifamily, community centers from total retail, etc.

It is a product aimed at the commercial real estate community. REA offers valuable insight into the opportunity or risk that supply changes may represent for investment portfolios of commercial real estate companies. REA goes back to 2000 and is updated monthly.

FUID-ECLOU:03576-12496-00_67ea0f89.longDescription: Why a Disaster Recovery for SAP on AWS? Not implementing a DR solution for mission critical systems exposes the customer to unexpected events that could cause huge lost in terms of business continuity. There are some studies that report that 1 hour downtime may cause between $100,000 to $1M lost for the company. With the cloud advent, there are now many great opportunities to implement an effective disaster recovery solution that allows to satisfy the required RTO and RPO leveraging the new cloud capabilities and flexibility. AWS is the “to go” platform for SAP workload and allows to implement many DR scenarios like on-premises to AWS or AWS to AWS. Key benefits of SAP DR on AWS Higher agility Reduced RPO / RTO for DR On demand provisioning of non-production environments from production backup on a need basis Consumption based pricing for Disaster Recovery Improved monitoring Dynamic scaling Deliverables Envisioning sessions to define cloud DR scenarios, objectives, and requirements Refining DR architecture, recovery process, and connectivity Setup and provision cloud infrastructure and connectivity, including VPN gateway, storage, virtual network, and security setup Setup of on-premises resources and VM(s) to support DR solution Deployment of DR solution and replicate data to AWS over a period. Remediation of workloads and VMs for AWS and DR solution compatibility Training session for the customer. Why eCloudvalley? “Notable vendor for public cloud infrastructure MSP in APAC region” by Gartner AWS SAP Competency (https://www.ecloudvalley.com/aws-sap-competency/) MAP for SAP Partner (https://www.ecloudvalley.com/ecloudvalley-launches-sap-migration-acceleration-program/) Notes Pricing may vary based on the scope of Implementation

FUID-GOMBO:09657-39004-00_a8d01df6.longDescription: Gomboc provides you with a way to define your cloud security policy through a no-code language so that you can have a baseline of how your cloud should look like. We then integrate into your DevOps environment through GitHub to review your IaC (currently Terraform and CloudFormation. Support for Pulumi, Ansible, and more will be available in Q4 2023). We access your AWS environment through a security auditor role with access to configuration (read-only). Finally - after examining your IaC and actual configuration and aligning it to the policy, we identify any gaps and provide pull-requests that deliver tailored remediations to those gaps. These pull requests contain full documentation on why we are proposing these changes, what those changes are, and links to the corresponding cloud provider services we are proposing to change. Our scanning is triggered on a configurable action (proposed-pull requests and commits) so that your code and deployment are always reviewed and fixed as your DevOps continuously evolves your application.

FUID-INFRA:00476-6825-20.04_0a3037ad.longDescription:
Webmin GUI Admin Control Panel for Ubuntu Server 20.04 LTS

Webmin is a program that simplifies the process of managing a Linux Ubuntu system. Normally you need to manually edit configuration files and run commands to create accounts, set up a web server and manage email forwarding. Webmin lets you perform these tasks and many more through an easy to use web interface and automatically updates all required configuration files for you. This makes the job of administering your system much easier.

Webmin Features

  • Create, edit and delete Unix Accounts on your system.
  • Export Files and Directories to other systems with the NFS protocol.
  • Set up Disk Quotas to control the amount of space available to users for their files.
  • Install, view and remove Software Packages in RPM and other formats.
  • Change your system's IP address, DNS Server settings and routing configuration.
  • Set up a Linux Firewall to protect your computer or give hosts on an internal LAN access to the Internet.
  • Create and configure virtual web servers for the Apache Webserver.
  • Manage databases, tables and fields in a MySQL or PostgreSQL Database Server.
  • Share files with Windows systems by configuring Samba Windows File Sharing.

    • Because Webmin is accessed though a web browser, you can log in from any system connected to your network. Webmin makes the process of creating Unix users, managing the Squid Proxy Server, managing a web server, apache, PostgreSQL, Postfix mail, LDAP Server, FTP Server, NFS, Qmail, Sendmail, Jabber, Openslp, Spamassassin, Dovecot & many more modules. Install 100's of different modules to easily manage your Ubuntu server. As good as having a desktop OS for Ubuntu.

    Follow our post configuration steps on - Setup Ubuntu with Webmin on GCP

FUID-JBSDE:03865-40844-00_05ff9fb0.longDescription: How Our Curbside Pickup Solution Works: The customer places an online order on the retailer’s website or mobile app and selects the option for curbside pickup at a specific retailer’s store location. Once the customer places an order, an email is sent notifying the customer the order was received and that the order is being processed. If placing the order through the mobile app, the integrated curbside service SDK is triggered which begins monitoring GPS position of the device – prompting for any permissions needed. When the order is ready, the customer receives an email from the retailer notifying them the item(s) is ready for pickup. Upon arrival, the customer calls the store or clicks a link in the store’s email. The employee brings out the item(s). If the customer has the retailer’s app, geofencing will automatically notify the store when the customer arrives. After the customer has picked up the item(s), the customer receives an email from the retailer that they have picked up the item(s) with a receipt and details of the purchase. Technical Details Involved: Integration of 3rd party curbside service SDK into native mobile Android/iOS app code, including triggering curbside orders on checkout and requesting vehicle information. Work with internal development/business teams to implement a dynamic UI element/modal in native app(s) to show current curbside status/arrival CTAs. Coordination of internal business teams for location data mapping and per-location geofence painting guidelines. Development and deployment of a “webhook” service API that can handle curbside service SDK ETA updates from customer devices and proxy them to internal systems as needed. Webhook service would be hosted via an AWS serverless stack (API Gateway, Lambda) to scale appropriately with incoming ETA and arrival event data. Modification of in-store pickup order application to include curbside data: vehicle information, ETA/arrival status. All communication between mobile clients, websites, and internal systems into/within/and outside of AWS secured via SSL. Any information stored in AWS-deployed resources (including RDS or ElastiCache) to have encryption enabled in-transit and at-rest, as applicable. Time Estimation: Estimated 1,000 manhours total (four full-time resources for six weeks, plus an extra 40 hours for project management, oversight, etc.) Two full-time app developers Two full-time API developers Assume four developers based on need, e.g., the in-store app might be a mobile app and not a web app, so this situation would translate to three UI developers and one API developer, etc. Project Assumptions: Existing app with checkout API integration already functional In-store app to manage pickup orders is currently in place; only modifications to support curbside-specific information needed In-store inventory is taken into account with pickup orders Available Add-Ons: In-store Pager system integration Map view of arriving/nearby/parked customers Additional UI development to support entering “parked” metadata in app, and including that in the in-store app – e.g., parking lot location/space number If no store pickup business process or app is currently in place, additional development will be needed to create a basic pickup order management app for use by employees to manage preparing, picking, and updating the status of pickup orders. Other capabilities as requested

FUID-JOHNS:04791-25028-00_5deb66e6.longDescription: ## Overview Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care for Acute Myocardial Infarction (AMI) contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores. The Hospital Value Based Purchasing (HVBP) Program is a Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) initiative that rewards acute care hospitals with incentive payments for the quality of care they provide to Medicare beneficiaries. CMS rewards hospitals based on the quality of care provided to Medicare patients, closely best clinical practices and well hospitals enhance patients experiences of care during hospital stays. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Efficiency Scores contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance ratios and scores for the Efficiency Medicare Spending per Beneficiary (MSPB) measure. Medicare makes incentive payments to hospitals based on how well they perform on each measure and how much they improve their performance on each measure compared to their performance during a baseline period. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Outcome Scores contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores for the outcome measures. This data package also includes a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Compare and their Clinical Process of Care domain scores, Patient Experience of Care dimension scores, and Total Performance Scores. CMS assesses each hospital’s total performance by comparing its Achievement and Improvement scores for each applicable Hospital Value Based Purchasing measure. CMS uses a threshold and benchmark to determine how many points to award for the achievement and improvement scores. CMS compares the achievement and Improvement scores and uses whichever is greater. --- ## License Information The use of John Snow Labs datasets is free for personal and research purposes. For commercial use please subscribe to the [Data Library](https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/prodview-ou2apz7asjdai?sr=0-13&ref_=beagle&applicationId=AWSMPContessa#offers) on AWS. The subscription will allow you to use all John Snow Labs datasets and data packages for commercial purposes. --- ## Metadata Description | Value ----|----- Data Package Complexity | Simple Available Enrichments | N/A Keywords | Hospital Compare, Process of Care, Value Based Healthcare, Acute Myocardial Infarction, Hospital Value Based Purchasing, CMS Value Based Purchasing, Patient Survey, Patient Experience of Care, Value Based Purchasing, Core Measures Other Titles | CMS Value Based Purchasing, Hospital Core Measures, HCHAPS Questions, HCHAPS Scores, CMS Quality Measures --- ## Included Datasets 1. Clinical Episode Based Payment Measures by Hospital This dataset shows 6 Clinical Episode-Based Payment (CEBP) Measures by hospital. It includes Conditions: Cellulitis, Kidney/Urinary Tract Infection, Gastrointestinal Hemorrhage; Procedures: Aortic Aneurysm, Spinal Fusion, Cholecystectomy and Common Duct Exploration. This measure takes into account important factors like patient age, health status (risk adjustment) and geographic payment differences (payment-standardization). 2. Clinical Episode Based Payment Measures by State This dataset shows 6 Clinical Episode-Based Payment (CEBP) Measures by state. It includes Conditions: Cellulitis, Kidney/Urinary Tract Infection, Gastrointestinal Hemorrhage; Procedures: Aortic Aneurysm, Spinal Fusion, Cholecystectomy and Common Duct Exploration. This measure takes into account important factors like patient age, health status (risk adjustment) and geographic payment differences (payment-standardization). 3. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Acute MI Scores This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores for the Clinical Process of Care AMI (Acute Myocardial Infarction) measures. 4. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Efficiency Scores This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance ratios and scores for the Efficiency Medicare Spending per Beneficiary (MSPB) measure. 5. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Outcome Scores This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores for the outcome measures. 6. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Patient Experience Scores This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their scores for the Patient Experience of Care HCAHPS dimensions. 7. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Pneumonia Scores This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores for the Clinical Process of Care Pneumonia measures. This dataset is no more updated now a days and has been retired from hospital compare datasets. 8. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Preventive Care Scores This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores for the Preventive Care measure. 9. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Surgical Care Improvements This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores for the Clinical Process of Care Surgical Care Improvement Project measures. 10. Hospital Compare Clinical Process of Care Total Performance Score This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their Clinical Process of Care domain scores, Patient Experience of Care dimension scores, and Total Performance Scores. 11. Hospital Value Based Purchasing Healthcare Associated Infection Scores This dataset contains a list of hospitals participating in the Hospital Value Based Purchasing Program and their performance rates and scores for the Clinical Process of Care Healthcare Associated Infection (HAI) measure. 12. Provider Data on Comprehensive Care for Joint Replacement Model This dataset includes provider data for two quality measures tracked during an episode of care that contains complication rate for hip and knee replacement patients and the Hospital Consumer Assessment of Healthcare Providers and Systems (HCAHPS) Survey information. --- ## Data Engineering Overview #### We deliver high-quality data * Each dataset goes through 3 levels of quality review * 2 Manual reviews are done by domain experts * Then, an automated set of 60+ validations enforces every datum matches metadata & defined constraints * Data is normalized into one unified type system * All dates, unites, codes, currencies look the same * All null values are normalized to the same value * All dataset and field names are SQL and Hive compliant * Data and Metadata * Data is available in both CSV and Apache Parquet format, optimized for high read performance on distributed Hadoop, Spark & MPP clusters * Metadata is provided in the open Frictionless Data standard, and its every field is normalized & validated * Data Updates * Data updates support replace-on-update: outdated foreign keys are deprecated, not deleted --- #### Our data is curated and enriched by domain experts Each dataset is manually curated by our team of doctors, pharmacists, public health & medical billing experts: * Field names, descriptions, and normalized values are chosen by people who actually understand their meaning * Healthcare & life science experts add categories, search keywords, descriptions and more to each dataset * Both manual and automated data enrichment supported for clinical codes, providers, drugs, and geo-locations * The data is always kept up to date – even when the source requires manual effort to get updates * Support for data subscribers is provided directly by the domain experts who curated the data sets * Every data source’s license is manually verified to allow for royalty-free commercial use and redistribution. --- ## Need Help? * If you have questions about our products, contact us at <info@johnsnowlabs.com>. --- ## About Us [John Snow Labs](https://www.johnsnowlabs.com/), an AI and NLP for healthcare company, provides state-of-the-art software, models, and data to help healthcare and life science organizations build, deploy, and operate AI projects.

FUID-MPHAS:03333-21252-00_3e89e9c8.longDescription: Machine Learning model performance degrades over time and the drift associated with data is one of the main reasons for the gradual drop in model accuracy. Drift Detection in Categorical variables aids in finding the extent of drift observed in data with respect to a reference dataset. The solution helps in identifying the features causing model’s accuracy loss and choosing a suitable interval to retrain the models.
FUID-MPHAS:03333-21252-00_3e89e9c8.shortDescription: A solution to identify and quantify data drift in categorical variables between multiple datasets.

FUID-MYNDS:01256-3528-00_51764dff.longDescription:
Move from Benefits Verification through Prior Authorization in Minutes

Myndshft is the only unified prior authorization platform in the market that handles both medical and pharmacy prior authorization. We have designed our platform to deliver real-time benefits and prior authorization insights directly in any system of record. We do this by combining hands-free automation with collective healthcare intelligence, a single source of truth for patients’ health and benefits information, providers’ clinical documentation, and payers’ plans and policies.

Medical Benefits Verification (BV)

  • Instantly verifies real-time medical benefits, co-insurance, copay,       deductible, and other plan details for 94% of U.S. covered patients
  • Organizes primary, secondary, or tertiary payers according to payment       responsibility, even if not provided by the patient
Medical Patient Financial Responsibility (PFR)

  • Automatically calculates the patient's total cost for services using the       provider's contracted rates and the exact patient benefits
Medical Prior Authorization (PA)

  • Verifies payer, plan, and group-specific PA requirements instantly
  • Pre-checks for errors and missing information
  • Submits PA request via the payer’s preferred submission path
  • Automates PA submissions using web-based forms and digitized       attachments
  • Monitors status of all PA requests in one convenient location
Pharmacy Benefits Verification and Prior Authorization (RX-BV/RX-PA)

  • Real-time benefits verification is part of a combined workflow with       prior authorization request
  • Automatically provides the prior authorization requirements response
  • Serves up required question set(s) if prior authorization is needed, with       timeframe for completion
  • Monitors status of all RX-PA requests in the same convenient location as       medical PA requests
FUID-MYNDS:01256-3528-00_51764dff.shortDescription: The only prior authorization platform that handles both medical and pharmacy prior authorizations.

FUID-NORTH:03425-11513-00_72deee8d.longDescription: Modern businesses face the challenge of managing growing volumes of data while ensuring fast, reliable access for analytics and decision-making. Amazon Redshift, a high-performance, cloud-native data warehouse, addresses this need with its scalable architecture, advanced query performance, and seamless integration with AWS services. However, migrating to Redshift requires careful planning and execution to minimize disruption and maximize value. NorthBay Solutions simplifies this process with a comprehensive migration solution that leverages key AWS services, including AWS Data Migration Service (DMS) for minimal downtime, AWS Glue for seamless data transformation, and Amazon S3 for scalable storage. Automating tasks with AWS Lambda and ensuring security with AWS IAM, NorthBay ensures a streamlined, secure, and fully optimized migration experience. With performance monitoring via Amazon CloudWatch, businesses gain the tools needed to scale their analytics capabilities and unlock actionable insights faster. By offering end-to-end support, NorthBay enables businesses to transition to Amazon Redshift with minimal disruption. The managed service automates complex processes like data transformation and real-time analytics while optimizing for cost and scalability. Customers benefit from faster migration timelines, enhanced operational efficiency, and the ability to harness advanced business intelligence tools, empowering them to make data-driven decisions with confidence. Approach Here are the key activities we will deliver throughout the process: (1) Comprehensive Assessment and Strategy: Evaluate your current data setup, define a tailored migration strategy, and ensure a smooth transition to Amazon Redshift with minimal business disruption. (2) Performance and Scalability Enhancements: Optimize performance and scalability to deliver faster insights, while maintaining data integrity and security throughout the migration process. (3) Streamlined Migration and Ongoing Support: Enable seamless access to reliable, high-quality data through streamlined migration, complemented by ongoing support to optimize performance and adapt to changing needs. (4) Empowered Analytics for Long-Term Success: Equip your team with real-time analytics and reporting capabilities to drive data-driven decisions and sustained business growth. Deliverables Based on the scope, the following deliverables will be provided: (1) Seamless Amazon Redshift Migration: Tailored assessments, secure setup, and cost-efficient migration to ensure a smooth transition. (2) Optimized Performance and Insights: Enhanced query speed, real-time integration with reporting tools, and dashboards displaying KPIs to support data-driven decisions. (3) Empowered Teams and Long-Term Success: Comprehensive training, technical documentation, solution architecture diagrams, and ongoing monitoring for scalability and cost efficiency. Outcomes Here are some key benefits you’ll gain from our solution: (1) Enhanced Data Processing Performance: NorthBay's solution accelerates data processing and analysis, enabling your team to access critical insights quickly and make smarter decisions in real-time. (2) Scalable Data Architecture for Future Growth: Our solution’s scalability feature ensures your data warehouse grows with your business, adapting to changing needs without disrupting operations. (3) Cost Savings with Resource Usage: The flexible pricing and optimization features of Northbay’s data warehouse migration solution helps you reduce costs while maintaining high performance and scalability. (4) Improved Data Availability and Real-Time Analytics: Real-time data integration with powerful tools will enable faster decision-making, accurate reporting, and enhanced operational agility. (4) Simplified Data Management and Security: AWS migrating solution centralizes data management, enhances security, and reduces administrative overhead for improved efficiency and compliance. AWS services such as Amazon S3, Amazon Redshift, Amazon Glue, Amazon RDS, Amazon CloudWatch, Amazon Lambda and Amazon DMS will be considered for the solution.
FUID-NORTH:03425-11513-00_72deee8d.product: accelerate business insights with a amazon redshift migration
FUID-NORTH:03425-11513-00_72deee8d.shortDescription: NorthBay Solutions provides a fully managed service to help businesses migrate their data warehouses to Amazon Redshift with ease. This solution streamlines the transfer, transformation, and loading of data from legacy systems, enabling fast, scalable analytics in the cloud. With minimal downtime, automated processes, and optimized performance, NorthBay empowers businesses to scale efficiently and unlock real-time insights for better decision-making and enhanced business intelligence.

FUID-NTTDA:02324-11666-00_a910af49.longDescription: As organizations strive to implement transformation faster and build new revenue-generating customer experiences that can be brought to market at an exponential pace, they are embracing the use of containers to empower development teams with programmatic access to a flexible and secure IT infrastructure. With their growing use, Container platforms are trending higher in complexity and scale. Mitigating this complexity, while providing an optimal DevOps experience, requires a sophisticated hybrid / multi-cloud model, supported by providers that possess the skills and expertise to effectively manage and defragment the cloud native container ecosystem. NTT DATA helps you deploy applications faster within a hybrid infrastructure environment using its AWS Red Hat OpenShift services portfolio that encompasses design, implementation, and management of Kubernetes Based OpenShift container-orchestration platforms. These Services empower DevOps teams to integrate OpenShift into a continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipeline and build scalable applications. #How it Works A successful journey begins with a road map. Together, we collaborate throughout your cloud journey by identifying the shared goals of multiple stakeholders and designing a roadmap to connect the dots from strategy to execution. That roadmap encompassed several phases: Inspire – Guided introduction to RedHat OpenShift technologies with actionable design. Build – Helping to conceptualize and create a verified OpenShift container platform. Run – Keeps the platform running day in and day out. Evolve – Continuing Innovation. Managing prioritized backlogs, optimizing workloads and identifying improvements.

FUID-PEXIP:01388-5733-00_75547dcc.longDescription:
Pexip Infinity a la carte licensing enables self-hosted deployment of Pexip Secure Meetings or Pexip Connect for Google Meet in your organization's private GCP cloud. Pexip licensing is independent of the number of virtual servers (Infinity Management or Conferencing nodes) deployed allowing your organization to easily scale up and down based on your specific deployment.


You can also use the GCP APIs and the Pexip Infinity management API to monitor usage and bring up / tear down Conferencing Nodes as required to meet conferencing demand or allow Pexip Infinity to handle this automatically for you via its dynamic bursting capabilities. Pexip publishes disk images for the Pexip Infinity Management Node and Conferencing Nodes. These images may be used to launch instances of each node type as required.

Supermetrics for BigQuery allows you to get all your marketing and sales data, including Facebook Ads into BigQuery with a few clicks, and build insightful dashboards with tools like Google Data Studio, Looker, Tableau and Qlik.

How does it work? Three simple steps in one minute:

  1. Enroll by clicking the blue button above ↑.
  2. Configure the transfer and connect to your Facebook Ads account.
  3. Build dashboards: use our ready-made templates or create your own.

Supermetrics will do the rest: loading your data and updating your dashboards every day.

Watch this video to learn how to set up your first transfer

What’s special about Supermetrics for BigQuery?

  • A zero-configuration, zero-maintenance workflow designed with simplicity
  • Data transformed into the format marketers need, with denormalized schemas that ensure the best performance and easy usability in reporting tools
  • Entire workflow inside BigQuery UI
  • Best-of-breed integrations with marketing platforms: More metrics available than any other 3rd-party tool
  • A dedicated Data Studio connector: Optimized for marketing data in BigQuery. Get any data you need without data blending or transformation

    How can marketing benefit?

    • All your marketing and sales data in one place, always available and up-to-date
    • Blend data from different sources: compare paid campaigns across networks, or link advertising data with web analytics or CRM data
    • Have full control of historical data: many marketing platforms only store your data for a limited number of months
    • Unparalleled robustness and load speed for your Data Studio reports
    • Spend less time moving data and more time using it
    • Make better business decisions, faster

FUID-THEBR:06766-27715-00_34aff4a4.company: the broad institute part of the aws open data sponsorship program
FUID-THEBR:06766-27715-00_34aff4a4.longDescription: The Cell Painting Image Collection is a collection of freely downloadable microscopy image sets. Cell Painting is an unbiased high throughput imaging assay used to analyze perturbations in cell models. In addition to the images themselves, each set includes a description of the biological application and some type of "ground truth" (expected results). Researchers are encouraged to use these image sets as reference points when developing, testing, and publishing new image analysis algorithms for the life sciences. We hope that the this data set will lead to a better understanding of which methods are best for various biological image analysis applications.

FUID-VIONL:00702-1365-00_48dc434d.longDescription:
Our AI-driven Contextual Ad Breaks are designed to help AVOD and FAST services capitalize on their content libraries and increase advertising revenue without compromising the user experience.

Seamless Advertising Experience with Contextual Ad Breaks

Contextual Ad Breaks are an innovative and efficient way to ensure a better experience for both advertisers and consumers. AINAR Contextual Ad Breaks was specifically created for AVOD and FAST services, aiming to increase advertising revenue while providing a seamless viewing experience for audiences. By leveraging the latest advances in computer vision and machine learning, AINAR Contextual Ad Breaks accurately and efficiently detects natural advertisement breaks in video assets. This means that commercials are placed at the natural cue points in the story, avoiding the disruption of gripping scenes or important dialogues.

Our research have shown that over 64% of people abandon AVODs due to a poor ad experience and with our product, viewers will not have to endure commercials randomly placed in the middle of an important scene.

Hyper-Targeted Advertising with Contextual Analysis

AINAR's advanced technology accurately detects faces, actions, scenes, emotions, and moods, allowing for targeted ad placements aligned with the content being consumed. Through contextual ad breaks and detailed scene analysis, AINAR enables hyper-targeting, resulting in increased impressions and conversions. By understanding the power of storytelling, AINAR has developed the Contextual Ad-Break Tool, which utilizes deep learning and artificial intelligence to analyze the context, sentiments, and emotions of movies or TV shows. By identifying scenarios within the content that match pre-defined parameters, the tool suggests accurate ad placements with the right mood and tone. The outcome is an ad experience where viewers don't feel ads are randomly inserted during engaging scenes or crucial dialogues. Contextual ad breaks keep viewers engaged with the platform and provide better ROI for advertisers.

AINAR Ad Breaks go beyond simply identifying black frames. It considers changes in mood levels, storytelling, speech, scene boundary detection, and more to determine the probability of a suitable ad break. AINAR Ad-Breaks categorizes breaks into three ranks: black frame and type of scene transition/break, primary breaks, and secondary breaks. This allows content owners to prioritize and tier their advertisement inventory, tailoring the ad experience to each piece of content. Leveraging Vionlabs mood analysis, AINAR exposes information about the sentiment of the scene before heading into the ad break, enabling advertisers to target based on the content's mood and sentiment. With advanced deep learning and AI capabilities, advertisers can have confidence that their ads will be placed in the most effective context, leading to better engagement and more successful campaigns.

Our Contextual Ad Breaks can be delivered with millisecond or frame accuracy, ensuring the success of any FAST or AVOD service.
FUID-VIONL:00702-1365-00_48dc434d.shortDescription: AINAR Contextual Advertising: Revolutionizing Ad Breaks for AVOD and FAST Channels

FUID-WINDS:00414-1133-00_bb945425.longDescription:
Windsor.ai for BigQuery allows you to get all your marketing and sales data, including Gong, into BigQuery with a few clicks, and build insightful dashboards with tools like Google Data Studio, Looker, Tableau and Qlik.

How does it work? Five simple steps in one minute:

  • Step 1: Click on the "Enroll" button located above and follow the prompts.
  • Step 2: Create a new transfer and complete the transfer form.
  • Step 3: Wait for the initial historical transfer to complete syncing, which may take several minutes or even days depending on the size of your data source.
  • Step 4: Start utilizing your data.
a Windsor.ai will do the rest: loading your data and updating your dashboards every day.

What’s special about Windsor.ai for BigQuery?

  • A zero-configuration, zero-maintenance workflow designed with simplicity
  • Data transformed into the format marketers need, with denormalized schemas that ensure the best performance and easy usability in reporting tools
  • Best-of-breed integrations with marketing platforms: More metrics available than any other 3rd-party tool

How can marketing benefit?

  • All your marketing and sales data in one place, always available and up-to-date
  • Blend data from different sources: compare paid campaigns across networks, or link advertising data with web analytics or CRM data
  • Have full control of historical data: many marketing platforms only store your data for a limited number of months
  • Unparalleled robustness and load speed for your Looker Studio reports
  • Spend less time moving data and more time using it
  • Make better business decisions, faster
Windsor.ai's connectors can be set up in just five minutes and can adapt to any changes in the source automatically. This means that your data engineering team can focus on creating value instead of spending time on data pipelines.

About Windsor.ai

At Windsor.ai we connect the worlds data. 300k data professionals in 134 countries use us to connect their data. We offer connectors to 300+ data sources and send data to 16 destinations, including BI tools, spreadsheets, and databases. Also we have a collection of marketing dashboard templates with easy-to-follow instructions for connecting your own data.
